an5.50:3.4: vuddho ceva → vuḍḍho ceva (s1-3) | buddho ceva (mr), arahā ca → arahā cā’ti (?)
an5.50:7.1: bhadraṃ yānaṃ → bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni (s1-3, km) | bhaddaṃ yānaṃ (pts1) | bhadraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ (mr), mahaccā → mahacca (bahūsu)
an5.50:18.4: Taggha, bhante, sokasallaharaṇo → taggha bhante sokasallaharaṇo (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
